message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $15,000. I think it will really be valuable for you, and this is a competitive price.
I'm really interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is quite a bit below its value. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $13,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. Can you consider that price?
